property.name: childObjectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API name of the object the layout is for.

property.name: parentObjectApiName
property.label: Parent Object API Name
property.description: API name of the parent object the layout is for.

property.name: parentFieldApiName
property.label: Parent Field API Name
property.description: API name of the parent field in the child object.

property.name: grandParentFieldApiName
property.label: Grandparent Field API Name
property.description: API name of the grandparent field in the child object. (This is for a parent-child-grandchild layout traversal.)

property.name: tab
property.label: Tab
property.description: Tab where the layout is placed.

property.name: forOpe
property.label: Is the layout for OPE?
property.description: Check if layout is for an OPE feature.

property.name: withRecordType
property.label: Does the object have record types?
property.description: Check if object has record types.

property.name: withMarkAsComplete
property.label: Add Mark As Complete button?
property.description: Check if Mark As Complete button has to be included.
